official-title.#text: To protect personal and financial information by requiring certain certifications by entities awarded funds under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act for the operation of a Navigator program or certain other Exchange activities.

header.#text: Protecting personal and financial information by requiring certain certifications by entities awarded ACA funds for the operation of a Navigator program or certain other Exchange activities

quote.#tail: ) shall require that in the case of an entity designated by or awarded funds by an Exchange or the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: or for carrying out activities to facilitate enrollment in qualified health plans or to advocate for enrolling certain populations in qualified health plans, such entity shall certify to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: subsection (i) of section 1311 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1311/ss:i

text.#text: The entity has in place appropriate policies and safeguards to protect any personally identifiable information and financial information collected or used by such entity with respect to the operation of such program or with respect to carrying out such activities, as applicable.

The entity has in place appropriate policies prohibiting the employment by such entity, with respect to the operation of such program or with respect to carrying out such activities, as applicable, of any individual who has been convicted of—

text.#text: The provisions of this section shall apply to designations made and funds awarded before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
